mapper.select: select case when mi.Member_Type = 0 then CONVERT((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(pbi.Personal_Name),'22')) using utf8) when mi.Member_Type = 1 then CONVERT((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(ci.Compang_Name),'22')) using utf8) end as membername, CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(ir.Invest_Amount_Valid),#{sKey})) as signed) Invest_Amount , ir.Invest_Date,ir.IsAuto,ir.Invest_Type,mi.Member_No,investType.name1 as investTypes from Invest_Record ir left join DICT investType on investType.code1= ir.Invest_Type and investType.tcode = 'DICT_TZLX' left join Member_Info mi on mi.Member_ID = ir.Member_ID left join personal_base_info pbi on mi.Personal_ID = pbi.Personal_Id and mi.Member_Type=0 left join company_info ci on mi.Company_ID =ci.Company_ID and mi.Member_Type=1 where ir.Apply_Id=#{projectID} and ir.IsValid=0

select case when mi.Member_Type = 0 then CONVERT((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(pbi.Personal_Name),'22')) using utf8) when mi.Member_Type = 1 then CONVERT((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(ci.Compang_Name),'22')) using utf8) end as membername, CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(ir.Invest_Amount_Valid),'22')) as signed) Invest_Amount , ir.Invest_Date,ir.IsAuto,ir.Invest_Type,mi.Member_No ,investType.name1 as investTypes from Creditor_Trans ct left join Invest_Record ir on ir.Invest_Id = ct.Invest_Id left join DICT investType on investType.code1= ir.Invest_Type and investType.tcode = 'DICT_TZLX' left join Member_Info mi on mi.Member_ID = ir.Member_ID left join personal_base_info pbi on mi.Personal_ID = pbi.Personal_Id and mi.Member_Type=0 left join company_info ci on mi.Company_ID =ci.Company_ID and mi.Member_Type=1 where ct.CTA_Id = #{ctaId} and ct.Statu !=2
